hero.subtitle: Bridging continents and cultures, delivering authentic Indian treasures to your doorstep worldwide.
hero.worldToIndiaSubtitle: Serving customers in over 50 countries across four continents with pride and precision.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.subtitle: A decade-long journey of connecting cultures and delivering happiness across borders.

founded.title: Founded in 2014
founded.para1: Venkat Express was born from a simple yet powerful observation: people living abroad deeply miss the authentic products and flavors of India. Whether it's a special spice blend, traditional decorative items, or handcrafted artifacts, these connections to home are irreplaceable.
founded.para2: What started as a small operation in Hyderabad has grown into a trusted international courier service, specializing in food items and decorative products that carry the essence of Indian culture.

growth.title: A Commitment to Excellence
growth.para1: Over the years, we've learned that successful international shipping is about more than logistics‚Äîit's about understanding the emotional value of every package. Each shipment represents someone's desire to stay connected to their roots, to share their culture, or to experience something new.
growth.para2: That's why we've invested heavily in specialized packaging, temperature-controlled solutions, and expertise in international customs regulations, particularly for food items and decorative goods.

today.title: Today and Beyond
today.para1: Today, Venkat Express serves customers in over 50 countries, managing everything from individual packages to large-scale commercial shipments. Our team of experts ensures every item‚Äîwhether it's delicate sweets, aromatic spices, or intricate handicrafts‚Äîarrives safely and on time.
today.para2: We're proud of our 99% safe delivery record and the trust our customers place in us. But what truly drives us is knowing that with every delivery, we're helping people maintain their cultural connections and create new memories.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide every decision we make and service we provide.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: Sourcing only the most genuine products from trusted suppliers across India.

trust.title: Trust & Reliability
trust.description: Ensuring every package is handled with care and delivered securely to your doorstep.

globalReach.title: Global Reach
globalReach.description: Connecting the Indian diaspora in over 50 countries to the tastes and culture of home.

community.title: Community Support
community.description: Empowering local artisans and farmers with a global platform for their authentic craft.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.subtitle: A decade of growth, innovation, and unwavering commitment to excellence.

2014.title: Founded in Hyderabad
2014.description: Venkat Express was established with a vision to bridge the gap between India and the world, starting with a small team passionate about cultural connections.

2017.title: International Expansion
2017.description: Expanded services to 20+ countries across North America, Europe, and Asia, establishing key partnerships and logistics networks.

2019.title: Specialized Excellence
2019.description: Became recognized experts in shipping food items and decorative products internationally, mastering complex regulations and preservation techniques.

2022.title: Digital Transformation
2022.description: Launched our comprehensive online platform for seamless ordering, real-time tracking, and enhanced customer experience.

2024.title: Industry Leader
2024.description: Proudly serving 50+ countries with 15,000+ satisfied customers and maintaining a 99% safe delivery record.

hero.title: Prohibited & Restricted Items
hero.subtitleMobile: Items we cannot ship for safety and legal compliance.
hero.subtitleDesktop: For the safety of our carriers and compliance with international law, please ensure your shipment does not contain any of the items listed below.

disclaimer.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notice
disclaimer.text1: Each country and courier service has its own restricted/prohibited list. Some items (like lithium batteries, alcohol, or medicines) may require special approval or packaging, while others are completely banned.
disclaimer.text2: Please contact our customer support team
disclaimer.text3: before shipping if you have any questions about specific items or requirements for your destination country.

cta.title: Need Help Shipping Something?
cta.subtitle: Our team of experts can help you navigate international shipping regulations and ensure your package arrives safely.
